Class FriendWallMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.wall.FriendWallMenu

  • public class FriendWallMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendWallMenu class interacts with the user on the Friends' Wall Page
    Version:
    1.4 07 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Wa Thone

        Displays the Friend's Wall Page, input choices, and prompt

      • readOption

        public char readOption()
        Takes in user's input choice and invoke corresponding methods
        Returns:
        choice the user's selected choice

      • displaySpecificThread

        public char displaySpecificThread(java.lang.String input)
        Directs user to the View a Thread Page of the thread the user selects
        Parameters:
        input - the input of user that specifies the thread selected, T
        Returns:
        'M' when the user chooses to go back to Main Menu from View a Thread Page, 'T' if error

      • displayUserFriends

        public void displayUserFriends()
        Displays a list of the friend's friends, indicating when he/she is also friend with the current user, in the format: . Full name (Common) [if friends with current user] . Full name [if not friends with current user]

      • postOnWall

        public void postOnWall(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Takes in user's input as text for a new post, and creates a post on the friend's wall
        Parameters:
        sc - the scanner that takes in user's input
